name: Rgba to KML colors converter
tagline: Convert colors from rgba to KML aabbggrr or CSS rrggbb formats, with javascript
body:
This little piece of code allows you to __convert colors from rgba format to hexadecimal in either CSS or KML formats__.
You can try it online here, or download the source and use it in your project.


### Author

note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
